email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 02/09/2001 09:26 AM --------------------------- "Jeff Smith" <jsmith@austintx.com> on 02/08/2001 07:08:03 PM To: <Phillip.K.Allen@enron.com> cc: Subject: the stage I am sending the Dr. a contract for Monday delivery. He is offering $739,000 with $73,900 down. He wants us to finish the work on the units that are being renovated now. We need to specify those units in the contract. We also need to specify the units that have not been remodeled. I think he will be a good buyer. He is a local with plenty of cash. Call me after you get this message. Jeff Smith The Smith Company 2714 Bee Cave Road, Suite 100-D Austin, Texas? 78746 512-732-0009 512-732-0010 fax 512-751-9728 mobile
